sentences: In the conclusions (FCCC/SBSTA/2004/L.23), SBSTA takes note of the report of the workshop on emissions projections from Annex I Parties held in September 2004.

SBSTA notes that the report contains useful information on methodological and reporting issues relating to greenhouse gas projections and on experiences in dealing with general and cross-cutting aspects of greenhouse gas projections, and also addresses specific issues relating to all sectors.

SBSTA notes that the report also encourages Annex I Parties to take this information into consideration when they prepare their next national communications in order to enhance the transparency of reporting.
enb_long_title: Tenth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
